articles.title: Actress Beatrice Chien dies at 81, she had roles in Ramen Teh and Crazy Rich Asians - CNA
articles.description: Chien only began her career as a freelance actress at the age of 62, after a 40-year career in nursing.

articles.title: Hilton to debut new hotel in Singapore – its largest in Asia-Pacific - CNA
articles.description: A conversion from the current Mandarin Orchard Singapore, the 1,080-room Hilton Singapore Orchard will open in January 2022.
